name: RAMISHKA MADHUSHAN
headline: PROJECT MANAGEMENT INTERN
professional_summary: Highly motivated Computer Science undergraduate with a strong background in Database Management, software development, and sustainable development initiatives. Skilled in leading cross-functional teams, managing project lifecycles, and delivering impactful solutions in both technical and community-focused environments. Experienced in stakeholder engagement, financial resource management, and event coordination, with proven success in building strategic partnerships and driving organizational goals. Certified in Google Project Management, Agile, and IT Support, with hands-on experience in software engineering, data analytics, and cloud-based solutions. Adept at combining technical expertise with leadership to deliver projects that create measurable value and long-term impact.

education.degree: BSC (HONS) IN COMPUTER SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (UNDERGRADUATE)

professional_experience.title: Field Data Analyst (Consultant)
responsibilities_and_achievements: Conducted field studies to evaluate a prototype ultrasonic monkey repellent in Fairtrade-certified coconut plantations.
Collected and analyzed observational data using KoboToolbox, focusing on behavioral patterns and device effectiveness.
Delivered weekly and final reports, providing actionable recommendations for product refinement.
Participated in team discussions, stakeholders and presentations, aligning findings with project goals and stakeholder expectations.

professional_experience.title: Project Manager, Marketing Project
professional_experience.project_name: Empowering Sri Lankan Communities Through Fairtrade Sri Lankan Market
professional_experience.company: Fairtrade Network of Asia & Pacific Producers
responsibilities_and_achievements: Led Fairtrade awareness campaigns across 12 locations in Sri Lanka, coordinating with export companies and managing all event logistics including promotional outreach, venue setup, and live cooking demos.

Successfully introduced Fairtrade certification to new audiences, boosted community engagement, and built strategic partnerships that enhanced Fairtrade’s visibility and consumer trust in sustainable trade practices.

professional_experience.title: Program Assistant (Sri Lanka)
professional_experience.company: Fairtrade Network of Asia & Pacific Producers
responsibilities_and_achievements: Coordinated consultations to develop Youth and Gender Strategies, aligning with organizational objectives.
Compiled case stories and a picture bank, contributing impactful stories per person to highlight key outcomes.
Prepared detailed reports and updates, facilitating effective stakeholder decision-making.
Supported country consultants in Social Compliance tasks, ensuring ethical and regulatory adherence.

professional_experience.title: Fairtrade Youth Ambassador (Sri Lanka)
responsibilities_and_achievements: Collaborated with international youth networks to promote responsible consumer behavior.
Participated in leadership, advocacy, and public speaking workshops to enhance communication and policy influence skills.
Gained knowledge of international and EU policies, contributing to efforts to promote fair trade.
Represented Fairtrade at forums including the European Parliament, UN Climate COPs, and local/national events, advocating for equitable trade practices.
Shared expertise and experiences to influence policy changes for a fairer trade system.

professional_experience.title: Bank Staff Trainee
responsibilities_and_achievements: Provided customer service support, enhancing communication and interpersonal skills.
Collaborated with the Personal Banking Operations (PBO) Section, gaining exposure to banking processes and operations.
Developed teamwork skills while assisting in daily bank activities and client interactions.

projects.name: Dog Breed Classifier
projects.description: Used a pre-trained image classifier to identify dog breeds, showcasing proficiency in transfer learning and fine-tuning machine learning models.

projects.name: Custom Image Classifier
projects.description: Designed and implemented a state-of-the-art custom image classification application using PyTorch, demonstrating expertise in deep learning and neural network design.

projects.name: Bike Sharing Predictor
projects.description: Predicted bike-sharing demand using AutoGluon, leveraging automated machine learning to optimize prediction models.

projects.name: Digit Classifier
projects.description: Developed a handwritten digits classifier with PyTorch, implementing deep learning techniques to achieve high accuracy.

projects.name: Social Media Auto-Tagging
projects.description: Created a landmark classification and tagging system for social media, using machine learning to enhance image recognition and metadata tagging.

projects.name: Scones Unlimited ML Workflow
projects.description: Built a complete machine learning workflow for Scones Unlimited on Amazon SageMaker, automating data preprocessing, model training, and deployment.

academic_projects.name: SafeShare Web Extension
academic_projects.description: Developed a secure browser extension that enables users to share login sessions temporarily without compromising security. Utilizes AES encryption for session protection and a timer API to automatically terminate access after a set period. This solution addresses the risks associated with traditional password sharing by providing encrypted, time-limited session sharing for enhanced security and user convenience.

volunteer_experience.role: Former Data Collecter and Data Entry
volunteer_experience.organization: Fairtrade Network of Asia & Pacific Producers

certifications.name: Google Digital Marketing & E-commerce Specialization Certificate

achievements: Grand Finalist, META 2.0+ Research Competition – Entrepreneurship and Innovation Club & Leo Club, University of Colombo
Round 01 Passed, Mora UXplore 2.0 - IEEE Student Branch of University of Moratuwa
